lead_paragraph: Snoopy, the world's most lovable beagle - and flying ace - embarks upon his greatest mission as he takes to the skies to pursue arch-nemesis The Red Baron, while his best pal, Charlie Brown, begins his own epic quest. They are joined by Lucy, Linus, Woodstock and the rest of the "Peanuts" gang.
